text: Cung Lê or Lê Cung (born May 25, 1972) is a Vietnamese-born American actor and former kickboxer and Mixed Martial Arts professional. He invincible on the Sanshou Kickboxing arena with a 17-0 record, the International Kickboxing Federation Championship Light Heavyweight Championship before moving to Mixed Martial Arts. Cung Lê defeated Frank Shamrock and became the middleweight champion of Strikeforce before resigning to pursue a film career and joining the UFC, the world's largest free-spirited tournament. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Kickboxers Category:1972 births Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American martial artists
title: Cung Le
